entry.title: Table
entry.content:
5.27日工作总结

今天工作的内容是产品UI的还原，单页面表格的还原。

数据项：公司名称、类型、投保时间、创建时间、状态、操作

如下是源码：

<template>
  <div>
      <el-table :data="ProductList"
                border
                :header-cell-style="tableHeaderStyle"
                :cell-style="tableStyle"
                :row-class-name="addEvenRowClass"
                style="width: 100%;margin-top: 20px">
        <el-table-column label="公司名称"
                        prop="insName"></el-table-column>
        <el-table-column label="类型"
                        prop="insType">
          <!-- <template slot-scope="scope">
          <div>{{applyStatusTxt1[scope.row.insType]}}</div>
          </template> -->
                        </el-table-column>
        <el-table-column label="投保时间"
                        prop="voteTime"></el-table-column>
        <el-table-column label="创建时间"
                        prop="createTime"
                        align="left"></el-table-column>
        <el-table-column label="状态"
                          prop="status">
        <!-- <template slot-scope="scope">
          {{applyStatusTxt[scope.row.status]}}
        </template> -->
        </el-table-column>
        <el-table-column label="操作"
                      fixed="right"
                      width="220">
       <template slot-scope="scope">
            <el-button size="mini"
                       type="text"
                       @click="putShelves"
                        v-if="scope.row.status=='通过'">上架</el-button>
            <el-button
              size="mini"
              type="text"
              @click="downShelves"
              v-else-if="scope.row.status=='待审核'">下架</el-button>
          </template>
        </el-table-column>
      </el-table>
  <el-pagination
      @size-change="getProductList"
      @current-change="getProductList"
      :current-page.sync="pageNum"
      :page-sizes="[5,10,20,30]"
      :page-size.sync="pageSize"
      layout="total, sizes, prev, pager, next, jumper"
      :total="total"
      align="right"
      style="margin-top: 40px">
  </el-pagination>
  </div>
</template>
<script>
  export default{
    name: 'index',
    components: {
    },
    data (){
    return {
      ProductList: [{
          insName: '人保保险',
          insType: '健康险',
          voteTime: '1年',
          createTime: '2020-05-23',
          status: '通过',
          statuss: '0'
      },
      {
          insName: '人寿保险',
          insType: '健康险',
          voteTime: '',
          createTime: '',
          status:'待审核',
          statuss: '1'
      },
      {
          insName: '平安保险',
          insType: '健康险',
          voteTime: '',
          createTime: '',
          status:'',
      },
      {
          insName: '重心保险',
          insType: '健康险',
          voteTime: '',
          createTime: '',
          status:'',
      },
      {
          insName: '人保保险',
          insType: '健康险',
          voteTime: '',
          createTime: '',
          status:'',
      },

      ],
        pageNum: 1,
        pageSize: 10,
        total: 0,
        applyStatusTxt:{
          '1': '通过',
          '2': '驳回',
          '3': '待审核',
              },
        applyStatusTxt1:{
          '1': '健康险',
              },
        form:{
          insName: '',
          insType: '',
          voteTime: '',
          createTime: '',
          status:'',
        },
      }
    },
    created(){
    this.getProductList()
    },
    methods: {
      getProductList() {
        let params = {
          status: this.status,
          insName: this.insName,
          insType: this.insType,
          pageCurrent:this.pageNum,
          pageLimit: this.pageSize
        }
        this.$http.post('/Product/list', params).then(res => {
          this.ProductList = res.data
          this.total = res.page.resultCount
        }, error => {
          console.log(error)
        })
      },
      tableHeaderStyle(){
        return 'background-color: #e3ecfc;font-size: 14px;font-weight: 600;color: #2d4667;text-align: center;'
      },
      tableStyle(){
        return 'text-align: center;font-size: 12px;color: #707070;'
      },
      addEvenRowClass({row,rowIndex}){
        if((rowIndex%2) !== 0){
          return 'evenRow'
        }
      }
    },
  }

</script>

<style scoped>
    label{
        padding: 0px !important;
        color: #222 !important;
    }
    .tableHeaderStyle{
      background-color: #e3ecfc;
      font-size: 14px;
      font-weight: 600;
      color: #2d4667;
      text-align: center;
    }
</style>
<style>
  .el-table .evenRow{
    background-color: #fafbfc;
  }
</style>

其中用到了ElementUI

Table的使用

示例代码

  <template>
    <el-table
      :data="tableData"
      style="width: 100%">
      <el-table-column
        prop="date"
        label="日期"
        width="180">
      </el-table-column>
      <el-table-column
        prop="name"
        label="姓名"
        width="180">
      </el-table-column>
      <el-table-column
        prop="address"
        label="地址">
      </el-table-column>
    </el-table>
  </template>

  <script>
    export default {
      data() {
        return {
          tableData: [{
            date: '2016-05-02',
            name: '王小虎',
            address: '上海市普陀区金沙江路 1518 弄'
          }, {
            date: '2016-05-04',
            name: '王小虎',
            address: '上海市普陀区金沙江路 1517 弄'
          }, {
            date: '2016-05-01',
            name: '王小虎',
            address: '上海市普陀区金沙江路 1519 弄'
          }, {
            date: '2016-05-03',
            name: '王小虎',
            address: '上海市普陀区金沙江路 1516 弄'
          }]
        }
      }
    }
  </script>

注： 当el-table元素中注入data对象数组后，在el-table-column中用prop属性来对应对象中的键名即可填入数据，用label属性来定义表格的列名。可以使用width属性来定义列宽。

el-table

后台项目

Button的使用

示例代码：订单（oms/order）操作按钮

<el-table-column label="操作" width="200" align="center">
          <template slot-scope="scope">
            <el-button
              size="mini"
              @click="handleViewOrder(scope.$index, scope.row)"
            >查看订单</el-button>
            <el-button
              size="mini"
              @click="handleCloseOrder(scope.$index, scope.row)"
              v-show="scope.row.status===0">关闭订单</el-button>
            <el-button
              size="mini"
              @click="handleDeliveryOrder(scope.$index, scope.row)"
              v-show="scope.row.status===1">订单发货</el-button>
            <el-button
              size="mini"
              @click="handleViewLogistics(scope.$index, scope.row)"
              v-show="scope.row.status===2||scope.row.status===3">订单跟踪</el-button>
            <el-button
              size="mini"
              type="danger"
              @click="handleDeleteOrder(scope.$index, scope.row)"
              v-show="scope.row.status===4">删除订单</el-button>
          </template>
        </el-table-column>

涉及到的点：v-if或者v-show动态显示按钮的状态

分页的使用

Element使用示例：

<el-pagination
      @size-change="handleSizeChange"
      @current-change="handleCurrentChange"
      :current-page="currentPage4"
      :page-sizes="[100, 200, 300, 400]"
      :page-size="100"
      layout="total, sizes, prev, pager, next, jumper"
      :total="400">
</el-pagination>
<script>
  export default {
    methods: {
      handleSizeChange(val) {
        console.log(`每页 ${val} 条`);
      },
      handleCurrentChange(val) {
        console.log(`当前页: ${val}`);
      }
    },
    data() {
      return {
        currentPage1: 5,
        currentPage2: 5,
        currentPage3: 5,
        currentPage4: 4
      };
    }
  }
</script>

实际的使用：

  <div class="pagination-container">
      <el-pagination
        background
        @size-change="handleSizeChange"
        @current-change="handleCurrentChange"
        layout="total, sizes,prev, pager, next,jumper"
        :current-page.sync="listQuery.pageNum"
        :page-size="listQuery.pageSize"
        :page-sizes="[5,10,15]"
        :total="total">
      </el-pagination>
   </div>

作用域插槽

通过 Scoped slot 可以获取到 row, column, $index 和 store（table 内部的状态管理）的数据，用法参考 demo 

<template>
  <el-table
    :data="tableData"
    style="width: 100%">
    <el-table-column
      label="日期"
      width="180">
      <template slot-scope="scope">
        <i class="el-icon-time"></i>
        <span style="margin-left: 10px">{{ scope.row.date }}</span>
      </template>
    </el-table-column>
    <el-table-column
      label="姓名"
      width="180">
      <template slot-scope="scope">
        <el-popover trigger="hover" placement="top">
          <p>姓名: {{ scope.row.name }}</p>
          <p>住址: {{ scope.row.address }}</p>
          <div slot="reference" class="name-wrapper">
            <el-tag size="medium">{{ scope.row.name }}</el-tag>
          </div>
        </el-popover>
      </template>
    </el-table-column>
    <el-table-column label="操作">
      <template slot-scope="scope">
        <el-button
          size="mini"
          @click="handleEdit(scope.$index, scope.row)">编辑</el-button>
        <el-button
          size="mini"
          type="danger"
          @click="handleDelete(scope.$index, scope.row)">删除</el-button>
      </template>
    </el-table-column>
  </el-table>
</template>

<script>
  export default {
    data() {
      return {
        tableData: [{
          date: '2016-05-02',
          name: '王小虎',
          address: '上海市普陀区金沙江路 1518 弄'
        }, {
          date: '2016-05-04',
          name: '王小虎',
          address: '上海市普陀区金沙江路 1517 弄'
        }, {
          date: '2016-05-01',
          name: '王小虎',
          address: '上海市普陀区金沙江路 1519 弄'
        }, {
          date: '2016-05-03',
          name: '王小虎',
          address: '上海市普陀区金沙江路 1516 弄'
        }]
      }
    },
    methods: {
      handleEdit(index, row) {
        console.log(index, row);
      },
      handleDelete(index, row) {
        console.log(index, row);
      }
    }
  }
</script>

自定义渲染表

entry.title: Vuex
entry.content:
例子

import { mapState, mapMutations } from 'vuex'

store.js

import Vue from 'vue'
import Vuex from 'vuex'
Vue.use(Vuex)
export default new Vuex.Store({
  state: {
    isPlaying: false,
    coverUrl: ''
  },
  getters: {},
  mutations: {
    togglePlay (state, toggle) {
      state.isPlaying = toggle !== undefined ? toggle : !state.isPlaying
    },
    changeCover (state) {
      while (1) {
        const index = Math.floor(Math.random() * 3)
        const coverUrl = COVER_URL[index]
        if (coverUrl !== state.coverUrl) {
          state.coverUrl = coverUrl
          break
        }
      }
    }
  },
  actions: {}
})

使用mutations中的函数修改 state中的数据

在store.js中定义state和mutations,在组件中method

  1. 从store.js中的mutaions导入到组件中
  2. 将store中定义的函数映射到method里并调用
import { mapState, mapMutations } from 'vuex'
 methods: {
        ...mapMutations(['togglePlay', 'changeCover'])
        }
  1. 访问state中的数据
  2. 映射为当前组件的计算属性
computed: {
    ...mapState(['isPlaying', 'coverUrl'])
  },

通过this直接调用当前组件中的函数

视频

entry.title: Element
entry.content:
导入Element UI

通过vue ui创建的项目可以在初始化的时候选择element的插件

按需导入

将plugin的element.js文件导入到main.js文件中

在plugin中配置element ui

import Vue from 'vue';
import { Button, Select } from 'element-ui';
import App from './App.vue';
 Vue.use(Button)

main.js中的配置

new Vue({
  el: '#app',
  render: h => h(App)
});

最后在根页面或者组件中可直接使用

<el-row>
  <el-button>默认按钮</el-button>
  <el-button type="primary">主要按钮</el-button>
  <el-button type="success">成功按钮</el-button>
  <el-button type="info">信息按钮</el-button>
  <el-button type="warning">警告按钮</el-button>
  <el-button type="danger">危险按钮</el-button>
</el-row>

填充

在element组件已经使用的情况下，如何使布局填充是很关键的一个步骤，即所谓的美化。

在这里首先需要借助另一个工具——谷歌控制台

  1. 通过elements找到出问题的地方，比如假如要使整个屏幕填充色彩，是谁哪个标签没有填充
  2. 找到对应的类或者标签名，对标签添加自定义class

entry.title: 音乐播放器
entry.content:
First

Home页面初始化

<template>
  <div class="home">
  </div>
</template>

CSS

<style lang="scss">
.home {
  position: relative;
  z-index: 0;
  display: flex;
  justify-content: center;
  align-items: center;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  background-color: #ffedff;
}
</style>

SECOND

从View切换到Componet

编写player组件

此处只写一个template标签，随后切换回View/home

在Home界面中导入写好的组件（此处关于vue组件的复用可以查阅资料）

初始化

<script>
import Player from '../components/Player.vue'
export default {
  components: {
    Player
  }
}
</script>

返回编写Player组件

First-盒子

<template>
  <div class="player">
    <div class="player_disk">  </div>
    <div class="player_control"></div>
    <div class="player_progress"> </div>
  </div>
</template>

Second-样式

<style lang="scss">
.player {
  position: relative;
  display: flex;
  max-width: 300px;
  max-height: 75px;
  width: 300px;
  height: 75px;
  border-radius: 8px;
  background-color: white;
  box-shadow: 0 30px 60px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.12),
    0 20px 20px rgba(95, 23, 101, 0.2);
}
.player_disk {
  flex: 1.2;
  padding: 12px;
}
.player_control {
  flex: 2;
  padding: 12px 0;
  padding-right: 12px;
}
.player_progress {
  position: absolute;
  left: 9px;
  right: 9px;
  top: 0;
  bottom: 25px;
  z-index: -1;
}
</style>

跳转到Compent中编写Disk组件

先写template

<template>
  <div class="disk">   
  </div>
</template>
把Disk导入到Player中
<script>
import Disk from './Disk.vue'
export default {
  components: {
    Disk,
  }
}
</script>

插入Disk组件

  <disk />

不懂的部分-上传文件

 <div class="disk"// :class="{ disk__playing: isPlaying }">
    <label
      class="disk_cover"
      ref="cover"
      for="file"
      :style="{
        transform: stopMatrix,
        backgroundImage: coverUrl ? `url(${coverUrl})` : ''
      }"
    />
    <input
      id="file"
      ref="file"
      type="file"
      accept=".mp3"
      multiple
      @change="handleChange"
    />
  </div>

编写Disk的CSS

<style lang="scss">
.disk {
  position: relative;
  padding-top: 100%;
  border-radius: 100%;
  overflow: hidden;
  transform: translateY(-50%) scale(0.88);
  transform-origin: center bottom;
  transition: all 0.6s ease;
}
.disk input {
  display: none;
}
.disk_cover {
  position: absolute;
  top: -10px;
  left: -10px;
  right: -10px;
  bottom: -10px;
  background-image: radial-gradient(circle, #444 0%, #333 100%);
  background-size: cover;
  background-position: center;
}
.disk_cover::after {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 50%;
  left: 50%;
  margin-left: -8px;
  margin-top: -8px;
  width: 16px;
  height: 16px;
  border-radius: 100%;
  background-image: linear-gradient(45deg, white, #dabad1);
  box-shadow: 0 1px 1px 1px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
}
.disk__playing {
  transform: translateY(-50%);
  box-shadow: 0 10px 30px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1),
    0 20px 20px -10px rgba(108, 29, 171, 0.3);
}
.disk__playing .disk_cover {
  animation: rotate infinite 6s linear;
}
    @keyframes rotate {
  from {
    transform: rotate(0);
  }
  to {
    transform: rotate(360deg);
  }
}
    </style>

不懂的部分

<script>
import { mapState, mapMutations } from 'vuex'

export default {
  data () {
    return {
      stopMatrix: ''
    }
  },
  computed: {
    ...mapState(['isPlaying', 'coverUrl'])
  },
  watch: {
    isPlaying (val) {
      if (!val) {
        this.stopMatrix = window.getComputedStyle(this.$refs.cover).transform
      } else {
        const matrix = this.stopMatrix
        this.stopMatrix = ''
        const match = matrix.match(/^matrix\(([^,]+),([^,]+)/)
        const [, sin, cos] = match || [0, 0, 0]
        const deg = ((Math.atan2(cos, sin) / 2 / Math.PI) * 360) % 360
        const styles = [...document.styleSheets]
        styles.forEach(style => {
          const rules = [...style.cssRules]
          rules.forEach(rule => {
            if (rule.type === rule.KEYFRAMES_RULE && rule.name === 'rotate') {
              rule.cssRules[0].style.transform = `rotate(${deg}deg)`
              rule.cssRules[1].style.transform = `rotate(${deg + 360}deg)`
            }
          })
        })
      }
    }
  },
  methods: {
    ...mapMutations(['togglePlay', 'changeCover']),
    async handleChange () {
        }
      }

</script>

编写player.js

class Dispatcher {
  constructor () {
    this.handlers = []
  }

  listen (handler) {
    this.handlers.push(handler)
  }

  emit (...args) {
    this.handlers.forEach(handler => {
      handler(...args)
    })
  }
}

class Player {
  constructor () {
    this.audioContext = new AudioContext()
    this.playList = []
    this.playIndex = 0

    this.emptyNode = {
      file: null,
      offset: 0,
      start: null,
      source: null,
      buffer: null
    }

    this.onPlay = new Dispatcher()
    this.onPause = new Dispatcher()
    this.onChange = new Dispatcher()
    this.onReady = new Dispatcher()
  }

  async readAudioBuffer (file) {

      }


  async append (file) {

  }


  pause () {

  }

  stop () {

  }

  next () {

    }


  prev () {

    }


  get isEmpty () {

  }

  get current () {
  }

  get position () {

  }

  set position (val) {

  }

  get duration () {

}

export const player = new Player()

导入这个JS到DISK里

import { player } from '../player'

写方法（DISK）

const target = this.$refs.file
      const files = target.files ? target.files : []
      if (files.length) {
        for (let i = 0; i < files.length; i++) {
          await player.append(files[i])
        }
      }
      target.value = ''
    }
  },
  mounted () {
    player.onReady.listen(() => {
      this.changeCover()
    })
    player.onChange.listen(() => {
      this.changeCover()
    })
    player.onPlay.listen(() => {
      this.togglePlay(true)
    })
    player.onPause.listen(() => {
      this.togglePlay(false)
    })
  }
}

源代码

教学
